body:
Hello! I got the social media idea after seeing porkys twitter thread so I thought Since Im uploading avicus videos to my YT channel why not have My other social media links there!

Social Media Links!

Twitter: www.twitter.com/ItsSWAGx
Youtube: www.youtube.com/SWAG23JorDanPvp 
Instagram(s): 
MC Instagram: @Zoralyth 
Personal Instagram: @Bob.ert

Avicus Videos!

Episode 1 - http://youtu.be/XdEpXT3hLoE 
Episode 2 - Soon to come...

replies.body: Seems legit.. advertise a heap of social media links that have approx. 0 to do with Avicus. First thing I saw when I went onto your youtube was Kohi and OCN... At least wait until this video uploads before posting this stuff.
